Reviews.Title: “A real gem of a hotel”
Reviews.Author: david1055
Reviews.Content: In a totally perfect location, about 75 meters off Friedrichstrasse, walking distance to Museum Island, with plenty of excellent restaurants nearby. From the moment you arrive, you're met by a friendly and accomodating staff. The rooms are very large, totally new and spotlessly clean. A tasty continiental breakfast is included with your room. The management takes real pride in the place and I can't recommend it too highly

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Maryannoz
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a great location. Train, Bus, Tram very close although we didn't bother using any, we walked everywhere. We found to come from the Tegel Airport by bus it was easy to get out at Karlplatz stop and then walk up Reinhardstrase to Friedrichstadtpalast and the Hotel is just around the corner. We even walked up Reinhardstrase to the Central Station easily with our luggage. If you are looking for a luxurious stay this hotel is not for you, it is a basic hotel, good beds, fluffy white towels, buffet breakfast with good selection breads, fruits, ham, cheeses, cereals. Staff very friendly and helpful. The restuarant was not open except for breakfast and there is no facilities for tea/coffee etc. or laundry/ironing. Could do with little extra's in room like soap, shampoos etc. It is has two backpackers either side of hotel and the noise from them is quite loud in the early hours of the morning. We did use the internet at one of the backpackers daily. There are a lot of restaurants/cafes/supermarkets around the area. We used a small takeaway around the corner for tea/coffee which was very cheap. A lot of hotels nearby probably offer more for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: kmn727
Reviews.Content: This hotel is quiet, clean, friendly, reasonably priced, and in a great location. The staff are very friendly; I was really hungry in the middle of the afternoon, and the restaurant was closed, but they made me a small salad and some tea, which was great. Wireless internet access is free, but available only in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Little Hotel Pleases”
Reviews.Author: JM6980
Reviews.Content: Great experience at this economical little hotel with excellent location near major sites and stations. Clean, efficient, and unfailingly friendly. I needed some special help and the staff went out of its way to provide it. I would have felt like I was imposing at a bigger hotel, but at Dietrich-Bonhoeffer the staff shared my joy in resolving the problem (hint: passport). The bathrooms have soap but you need to bring shampoo. Comfy chairs in the lobby to sit while you cruise the free internet. Breakfast typically good, and they served me early so that I could eat before heading out for an early flight.

Reviews.Title: “Best deal in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: scarlett_reinhardt
Reviews.Content: Wedged between clasy Friedrichstrasse and bustling Orianenburgstrasse, right in the heart of East Berlin, this is probably your best deal in Berlin. Big, clean, confortable rooms, great breakfast and excellent location are the musts of this ideal hotel in Berlin. A close walk from 2 metro station, very close to the Friedrichstrasse Banhof, and to the river. I was not sure about this hotel when I first booked, but now there is no way I would come back to Berlin without staying there. This is not a luxurious hotel but it really is worth the price you pay.
